alert.note: Alert for McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 11 at 8:33PM MDT until April 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...McPherson County. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
